text: "Drive" is a 1984 song performed by The Cars. It was from their Heartbeat City album. The song came out in March 1984. It is a sad song. This song was the highest charting single by The Cars. It hit #3 on the Billboard Hot 100. It hit #1 on the Adult Contemporary chart. It hit #5 in the United Kingdom. Category:1984 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop songs Category:The Cars songs
title: Drive (song)
